snippet: The mixed-media works in Deborah Kass’s new show “No Kidding” are both cynical and droll, and draw from over 100 years of pop culture.
abstract: Artist Deborah Kass exhibition No Kidding at Paul Kasmin Gallery embraces pop culture.
lead_paragraph: The mixed-media works in Deborah Kass’s new show “No Kidding” are both cynical and droll, and draw from over 100 years of pop culture.

headline.main: Art as Social Critique — With a Little Help From the Rolling Stones and Katy Perry
